喢字的基本解释

喢
shà
古同“歃”，盟誓时用嘴吸取（牲血）。
多话。

喢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shà］
［《廣韻》山輒切，入葉，生。］
(1)同“歃”。指以唇轻抿。
(2)通“喋”。参见“喢血”。

喢字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喢； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页199第20
【廣韻】山輒切【集韻】色輒切，?音萐。【玉篇】多言也。　又【廣韻】叱涉切【集韻】尺涉切，?音謵。與呫同。詳前呫字註。　又失涉切，音攝。又敕涉切，音鍤。義?同。　又【廣韻】山洽切【集韻】色洽切，?音霎。小人言也。　又【廣韻】楚洽切【集韻】測洽切，?音插。義同。

喢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
喢字的起名意思

暂无。

喢
Basic explanation of words
喢
shà
Gu Tong was "ashamed" and used his mouth to suck (livestock's blood) during an oath.
Chatty.
喢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shà］
["Guangyun" Shan Noir is cut into leaves, raw. ]
(1) Same as "歃". Refers to the lips lightly.
(2) Through "chat". See "blood".
喢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　喢; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 199 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Shan Noir cut [Ji Yun] Color Noir cut,? Sound 萐. [Jade articles] More words.　[Guang Yun] Chi She-cut [Ji Yun] Ruler She-cut,? Yin 謵. Same as. Please refer to the previous note.　 Lost and cut again, audio and video. She cut again, and sounded. Righteous? Same.　[Guangyun] Mountain Qiaqie [Jiyun] Color Qiaqie, sound moment. The villain speaks too.　 [Guang Yun] Chu Qiaqie [Jiyun] Test Qiaqie,? Phonetic. The same meaning.
